corp.bpos:
SELECT CorpBp.record_time AS rcd_time,
            CorpBp.item_id AS bp_item_id,
            CorpBp.corporation_id AS corp_id,
            CorpBp.type_id AS bp_type_id,
            CorpBp.location_id AS loc_id,
            CorpBp.location_flag AS loc_flag,
            CorpBp.material_efficiency AS mat_eff,
            CorpBp.time_efficiency AS time_eff
        FROM Corp_Blueprints AS CorpBp
        WHERE CorpBp.quantity = -1
    ;
corp.orders:
SELECT CorpOrders.order_id,
            CorpOrders.type_id,
            CorpOrders.price,
            CorpOrders.volume_remain
        FROM Corp_MarketOrders AS CorpOrders
        WHERE (CorpOrders.is_buy = 0 OR CorpOrders.is_buy IS NULL)
            AND CorpOrders.order_state = 'active'
    ;

bp.acts:
SELECT BpAct.type_id AS bp_type_id,
            BpAct.activity_id AS act_id,
            BpAct.activity_time AS act_sec
        FROM BlueprintActivities AS BpAct
        WHERE BpAct.type_id IN ({type_ids})
    ;
bp.mats:
SELECT BpMats.type_id AS bp_type_id,
            BpMats.activity_id AS act_id,
            BpMats.material_type_id AS mat_type_id,
            BpMats.quantity AS mat_quant
        FROM BlueprintActivityMaterials AS BpMats
        WHERE BpMats.type_id IN ({type_ids})
    ;
bp.prods:
SELECT BpProds.type_id AS bp_type_id,
            BpProds.activity_id AS act_id,
            BpProds.product_type_id AS prod_type_id,
            BpProds.quantity AS prod_quant,
            BpProds.probability AS prod_prob
        FROM BlueprintActivityProducts AS BpProds
        WHERE BpProds.type_id IN ({type_ids})
    ;
